subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt stunned sixth-seeded Juan Martín del Potro, and Andy Murray rebounded after dropping a set to Leonardo Mayer at the United States Open.
snippet: Lleyton Hewitt stunned sixth-seeded Juan Martín del Potro, and Andy Murray rebounded after dropping a set to Leonardo Mayer at the United States Open.
